refnamediv.refpurpose: Find point matches between two images.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: matchAB = qdmatch(imA, imB) [matchBC, matchABC] = qdmatch(imB, imC, matchAB)

listitem.para: N by 5 matrix. It contains the point matches between imA and imB, and has the format of [y1 x1 y2 x2 zncc; ... ...]. N is the number of matches.
N by 5 matrix. It contains the point matches between imB and imC except those already recorded in matchABC, and has the same format as matchAB. N is the number of matches.
N by 6 matrix. It contains the point matches between imA, imB and imC, and has the format of [y1 x1 y2 x2 y3 x3; ... ...]. N is the number of matches.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function is used to find point matches between two images. It first uses SIFT matching algorithm to find sparse point matches between the two images, and then uses "quasi-dense propagation" algorithm to get "quasi-dense" point matches.
